description: Amu`s cousin and first puppy love. He is an apprentice patissier and used to make cakes for Amu when they were younger. While studying abroad in France, he fell in love with a woman named Eriko and proposed. However, before the wedding Eriko gets angry with him and he is afraid she is going to call off the wedding. His heart`s egg becomes a X Chara that Amu has to heal. In the end, Eriko tells Shuuji that she was only afraid that she wouldn`t be good enough for him, and they end up happily going through with the wedding ceremony.
name: Hinamori Shuuji
